subtitle: Ultimate Oscillator — multi-window momentum to reduce false signals.

measures.how_to_read: > 50 bullish bias; < 50 bearish; extremes over 70/under 30 flag overbought/oversold.
measures.caveats: Complexity may not add value over simpler oscillators for beginners.
measures.what_it_measures: Ultimate Oscillator derived from market data.

beginner_summary: Ultimate Oscillator — multi-window momentum to reduce false signals.
